-- retrieveCcomCodeList 공통코드 조회 SELECT COM_ID AS comId ,COM_CD_CD AS comCdCd ,COM_CD_NM AS comCdNm ,COM_CD_EXPL AS comCdExpl ,COM_DTL_CD AS comDtlCd ,COM_DTL_NM AS comDtlNm ,DEL_YN AS delYn ,CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10), FRST_RGST_DT, 23) AS frstRgstDt ,FRST_RGST_ID AS frstRgstId ,CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10), iif(LAST_MDFY_DT<>'',LAST_MDFY_DT, FRST_RGST_DT) , 23) AS lastMdfyDt ,iif(LAST_MDFY_ID<>'',LAST_MDFY_ID, FRST_RGST_ID) AS lastMdfyId ,COM_ORD AS comOrd ,CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10), BATCH_EXEC_DT, 23) AS batchExecDt --,dbo.fn_getUserName(FRST_RGST_ID) AS frstRgstNm --,dbo.fn_getUserName(LAST_MDFY_ID) AS lastMdfyNm FROM IRIS_ADM_COM_CD WHERE 1 = 1
AND COM_CD_CD LIKE '%'+#{code}+'%'
AND COM_CD_NM LIKE '%'+#{codeNm}+'%'
AND COM_DTL_CD LIKE '%'+#{codeDCd}+'%'
AND COM_DTL_NM LIKE '%'+#{codeDNm}+'%'
AND DEL_YN LIKE '%'+#{delYn}+'%'
ORDER BY COM_CD_CD, COM_DTL_CD
